comments:
Build I20070621-1340

I get this error quite often when I add methods to a Java file using the ctrl-1 hint over a method name for a method that I haven't implemented yet, or when using "Add required methods" on a class that implements an interface or abstract class. Any subsequent interactions with the editor containing the Java file just keeps repeating this error, and no further refactorings can be done on any Java files.
